title: oru tuNai namakkuNDu
sahitya:
oru tuNai namakkuNDu Om shuddha shakti Om shuddha shakti jaya satya jyOti


anupallavi

  aru uru guru shivan hariharan allA parama pitAvenap-paNiyum paramporuLAm


caraNam    iru mana vikAramAm ellaiyaik-kaDandE idaya guhaiyil anbar iduvenat-teLindadup eruvulagam 
adan tiruviLaiyATTadu pEr vaDivAghiya pOrvaiyai nIkkiDin AruyirAna shuddhAnanda niravadu
